articles.title: Stuck in neutral in their starter homes, what are millennials to do?
articles.description:
Dining rooms become playrooms and home offices become nurseries as families outgrow the homes they hoped would be temporary.

The post Stuck in neutral in their starter homes, what are millennials to do? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Millennials in Boston are repurposing starter homes as families grow.
Many are transforming dining rooms into playrooms and offices into nurseries.
Rising mortgage rates are limiting options for upgrading to larger homes.

articles.title: The Buccaneers are rested and at home. Is this where the Patriots’ six-game winning streak comes to an end?
articles.description:
The Patriots travel to Tampa on Sunday to take on the Baker Mayfield-led Buccaneers.

The post The Buccaneers are rested and at home. Is this where the Patriots’ six-game winning streak comes to an end? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots face Buccaneers in Tampa on Sunday, aiming to extend their six-game winning streak.
Baker Mayfield leads the Buccaneers, posing a significant challenge for the Patriots' defense.
A loss could impact the Patriots' playoff positioning and local fan morale in Boston.

articles.title: Farmers’ Almanac says it will cease publication after 208 years, citing financial challenges
articles.description:
The Maine-based publication, not to be confused with the even older Old Farmer’s Almanac in neighboring New Hampshire, was first printed in 1818.

The post Farmers’ Almanac says it will cease publication after 208 years, citing financial challenges appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Farmers' Almanac will cease publication after 208 years due to financial challenges.
The publication, first printed in 1818, is based in Maine, not New Hampshire.
Boston residents may lose a historical source of weather predictions and gardening advice.

articles.title: Want to help fight hunger in Boston? Here are 5 ways to do it.
articles.description:
Here are volunteer and donation opportunities to help food-insecure families in Boston.

The post Want to help fight hunger in Boston? Here are 5 ways to do it. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Volunteer opportunities are available to assist food-insecure families in Boston.
Five specific ways to help include donating food, funds, or time.
Local residents can directly impact hunger relief efforts in their communities.

articles.title: As injuries linger, Patriots rookie Kyle Williams could be poised for breakout opportunity
articles.description:
"We'll see where that goes late in the week, but Kyle should be ready to go here for us.”

The post As injuries linger, Patriots rookie Kyle Williams could be poised for breakout opportunity appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots rookie Kyle Williams may start due to ongoing injuries in the team.
Coach Bill Belichick indicated Williams should be ready by late this week.
Increased playing time for Williams could enhance the Patriots' offensive strategy.

articles.title: What songs are on your ‘divorce playlist’?
articles.description:
There's a difference between breakup songs and divorce songs, Love Letters writer Meredith Goldstein argues. Do you agree?

The post What songs are on your ‘divorce playlist’? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Meredith Goldstein discusses the distinction between breakup and divorce songs.
The article invites Boston residents to share their own divorce playlists.
Understanding these playlists can help locals process emotional challenges during divorce.

articles.title: 10 days after their ugliest loss of year, Bruins are looking like a very different team
articles.description:
"These guys give me everything they have. They really do."

The post 10 days after their ugliest loss of year, Bruins are looking like a very different team appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins show significant improvement after a tough loss on October 28, 2025.
Players are reportedly giving maximum effort, boosting team morale and performance.
Local fans are hopeful as the team aims for a playoff spot this season.
